title: Jenkins and Jonez - All-Star Weekend Reactions and a Mush vs. Slap Debate
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez - All-Star Weekend Reactions and a Mush vs. Slap Debate
description:
The guys discuss the show that Steph Curry put on in the All-Star game before LeBron James’s game-winner. Then they discuss Mike Tirico. Then they discuss Juwan Howard’s mush after the Michigan-Wisconsin game, why Mike is owed an apology, the sham of a dunk contest, and much more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
